articles.title: Chris Mason: Labour still has a big persuasion job ahead
articles.content: Ministers hope a partial U-turn will win over Labour rebels when MPs vote on welfare changes later.
articles.personality_presentation:
Bloody hell, this is beautiful! Chris Mason: Labour still has a big persuasion job ahead

Look at this gorgeous story: Ministers hope a partial U-turn will win over Labour rebels when MPs vote on welfare changes later.

Absolutely stunning! That's what I call a perfect dish of humanity!

articles.title: Father jumps off Disney cruise ship to save daughter who fell overboard
articles.content: Crew members were able to quickly rescue the pair, who were on the last day of a Disney cruise to the Bahamas.

articles.title: Boulter and Kartal win on record-breaking day for British players
articles.content: Katie Boulter and Sonay Kartal both produces impressive victories at either end of a record-breaking day for British players at Wimbledon.
